refundText.UnapplyThepaymentFromTheInvoice: Unapply the payment from the invoice
refundText.refundOnZuoraAndACreditMemo: refund on Zuora and a credit memo

switch.title: Switch this subscription to another product/plan

alerts.missingData: Some data required for switch is missing! Try refreshing the page.
alerts.subCanceled: The subscription is canceled and it cannot be switched.
alerts.over30: A subscription over 30 days cannot be switched. Money back period has ended.
alerts.version2: The subscription has already been switched/updated. Only version 1 subscriptions can be switched. Check Zuora for more details.
alerts.previewFailed: Computing a switch preview failed. Please try again in a bit.
alerts.manyActivation: The plan you’re trying to switch to offers fewer activations/websites than the current plan. ({current}/{available})
alerts.manyTeamMembers: The plan you’re trying to switch to offers fewer team members than the current plan. ({current}/{available})
alerts.indeterminateQuota: Could not determine quota for this subscription! Double check the current activations and the new limit before switching!
alerts.missingPaymentMethod: The subscription owner is missing the default payment method information. Try again once the user sets its default payment.
alerts.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again in a bit.

switchResponse.title: Switch response

success.planMsg: Subscription plan switched successfully from {from} to {to}.
success.productMsg: Subscription product switched successfully from {from} to {to}.

error.title: Switch error
error.msg: The switch process failed at {step}. Please resume the process manually.

plan.generic_error: An error occurred during the plan switch process
plan.unapply_payment: Unapply the Payment from the Invoice
plan.apply_payment: Reapply the Payment to the Invoice
plan.apply_credit_memo: Apply the Invoice to the Credit Memo

product.generic_error: An error occurred during the plan switch process
product.cancel_subscription: Cancel and refund the current subscription

switchResponse.msg: Due to plan/product switch, it is recommended to reload the backoffice.

switch.refund: Full refund (issue a full refund for the last order)

plan.quotaOverInfo: This plan cannot be used due to passing the quota limit!
